titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Richard C. Levin, President of Yale University, Inauguration Records
Levin (Richard C.), President of Yale University, Inauguration Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Wednesday April 24, 2019 at 07:29

did.unittitle: Richard C. Levin, president of Yale University, inauguration records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of certificates, letters, and other materials sent from universities, colleges, and scholarly societies recognizing Richard C. Levin as Yale's incoming president.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-A (YRG 2-A), Records of the Yale president's office.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the President's Office, 1993.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Richard C. Levin, President of Yale University, Inauguration Records (RU 99). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of certificates, letters, and other materials sent from universities, colleges, and scholarly societies recognizing Richard C. Levin as Yale's incoming president.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.
